meanings.definition: Coypus: large, aquatic rodents native to South America
meanings.sent1: The coypous swam gracefully in the river.
meanings.sent2: Many coypous live near the water.
meanings.sent3: The coypous decided to have a swimming race for fun.
meanings.sent4: The coypous' sleek bodies moved through the water like shadows.
meanings.sent5: I will never forget the sight of the coypous diving into the pond.

meanings.definition: Coypus: plural form of coypu, referring to more than one of these animals
meanings.sent1: We saw a group of coypus near the lake.
meanings.sent2: The coypus were playing together in the grass.
meanings.sent3: The coypus held a meeting to discuss their favorite foods.
meanings.sent4: The field was alive with the sounds of the coypus' chatter.
meanings.sent5: The coypus' footprints marked the path to the hidden pond.

meanings.definition: Coypus: the fur of coypus, used for clothing and accessories
meanings.sent1: Her coat was made of soft coypous.
meanings.sent2: The fashion show featured elegant designs using coypus.
meanings.sent3: The coypus' fur was so warm that even the snowflakes envied it.
meanings.sent4: She wrapped herself in coypus, feeling like a queen.
meanings.sent5: The coypus' fur gleamed in the sunlight, a true marvel of nature.
